summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2526 for the improvement of Thirty-fourth Avenue West, from Grand Boulevard to Elmore Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by attaching fire hydrants to the existing watermains in said district under Ordinance No. 29329, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
